Source code for SphericalCoordinatesFactory

from numpy import sqrt, pi, arctan2, cos, sin, zeros
from SphericalCoordinatesProperty import SphericalCoordinatesProperty
from PointSet import PointSet


[docs]class SphericalCoordinatesFactory:
    """
    TODO  SphericalCoordinatesFactory
    """    
    
    @staticmethod

[docs]    def CartesianToSphericalCoordinates(points):
        """
        TODO CartesianToSphericalCoordinates
        """
        
        horizontalSquaredDistance = points.X() ** 2 + points.Y() ** 2
        
        dis = sqrt(horizontalSquaredDistance + points.Z() ** 2)
        
        el = arctan2(points.Z(), sqrt(horizontalSquaredDistance)) * 180 / pi
         
        az = arctan2(points.Y(), points.X())  * 180 / pi
        az[az < 0 ] = 360 + az[az < 0]
        
        return SphericalCoordinatesProperty(points, az, el, dis)
    

    @staticmethod

[docs]    def SphericalToCartesainCoordinates(points):
        """
        TODO SphericalToCartesainCoordinates
        """
        x = points.Ranges() * cos(points.ElevationAngles() * pi / 180) * cos(points.Azimuths() * pi / 180) 
        y = points.Ranges() * cos(points.ElevationAngles() * pi / 180) * sin(points.Azimuths() * pi / 180)
        z = points.Ranges() * sin(points.ElevationAngles() * pi / 180)
        
        xyz = zeros((len(x), 3))
        xyz[:, 0] = x
        xyz[:, 1] = y
        xyz[:, 2] = z
        
        return PointSet(xyz)
